li.label: Lunar Power
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} channels the quiet power of the moon, striking with calm yet undeniable force. {PAWN_pronoun}’s attacks are deliberate and precise, bypassing defenses with an aura of serene strength.

li.label: Eclipsing Steps
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the silent grace of the moon's shadow, stepping lightly and disappearing into the darkness. {PAWN_pronoun} strikes with the subtlety of an eclipse, evading enemy detection.

li.label: Lunar Authority
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} commands the respect of those around {PAWN_pronoun}, like the moon's pull on the tides. {PAWN_pronoun}’s presence is calming, yet demands unwavering loyalty, drawing others to {PAWN_possessive} cause.

li.label: Eternal Night’s Strength
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thrives in the quiet of night, drawing strength from the stillness of the dark. {PAWN_pronoun} endures hardship with unwavering patience, calmly facing pain and exhaustion as though under the protection of the moon.

li.label: Midnight’s Protection
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves through even the darkest of situations untouched, much like the moon’s quiet light in the night sky. {PAWN_pronoun} emerges from the harshest conditions unscathed, protected by the serenity of the moon’s embrace.

li.label: Lunar Banquet
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} creates meals that glow with the delicate radiance of moonlight, nourishing those around {PAWN_pronoun} with subtle, celestial flavors. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that every meal is infused with the calm essence of the night sky.

li.label: Eclipse’s Gaze
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a captivating presence, drawing others like the moon pulls the tides. {PAWN_pronoun}’s aura ignites a quiet devotion, leaving others entranced by {PAWN_pronoun}’s calm but powerful influence.

li.label: Lunar Restoration
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the soothing light of the moon, restoring both body and spirit. {PAWN_pronoun}’s care is gentle, nurturing, and almost ethereal, ensuring that no ally falls to the darkness.

li.label: Lunar Gardens
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} cultivates the land with the patience of the moon’s cycles, nurturing life with a tender touch. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} walks, the land flourishes in the soft glow of lunar influence.
